The problem was solved by uninstalling the drivers, but before reinstalling, hooking up the hdmi cables). It is now working great, with no overscan. I have yet to hook-up a blu-ray device, but have tried some 1080 content from elsewhere ;). It looks awesome. I like that I only need the optical cable from the tv to the receiver, as the rest is passed to the tv via hdmi. This tv also plays back [nearly] any format from the usb ports, and I mean tons (everything from divx/xvid through mpeg4 & h264 [mkvs!], though it doesn't list dts tracks as an option). I have only used a flash drive, but plan on an external hd in the future. I noticed that its internal decoder is better than playing stuff back on the computer, as least where scene-released tv shows are concerned. This fine set also includes a picture-in-picture feature, but the downside is that just takes whatever is going through the coax for the sub-pic. The sub-pic is resizeable and the position can be moved to any of the 4 corners. All and all, this tv is great for the person wanting to use it for both a tv and a computer monitor. I play WoW and Battlefield Bad Company 2, and they both look as good as can be. Lastly, the 120hz this is kind of a marketing gimmick. It can basically take your source material, none of which is available at 120hz to begin with, and it can place frames in for a smoother picture. I generally switch my setting between standard and smooth. Sometimes stuff has a very peculiar look to it, so I switch it at that point.

Reviews.Title: Samsung LN40B630 40-inch
Reviews.Content: I'm very satisfied with the quality of picture of Samsung and highly recommend .Amazon offer a very good deal.Recommend to everyone who wish to purchase the new TV.

Reviews.Title: Very pleased with this purchase
Reviews.Author: R. Suvansri
Reviews.Content: I was looking for an lcd tv to replace our old tube tv in our family room.  I found this tv at best buy for about $150 more.  I was glad I also looked at amazon.  The experience couldn't have been better.  My brother has bought 2 flatscreens and also had no issues.As far as the tv goes, we already had a samsung plasma and loved that as well.  The picture is as crisp as our plasma. I did have to play around with the settings a bit to get the right colors, especially facial pigments. Also, the 120hz feature had to be dialed down a notch to avoid making filmed tv shows like sitcoms less jittery. Most shows I learned are at 60hz and so will appear jittery on here. Exception is live tv as far as I've noticed.  Basketball games for example were perfect.  I did see that turning the 120hz setting to its highest made the people on the tv seem almost 3-d.  But that jittery stuff was just too distracting.Sound is good for a tv speaker.  There's some pseudo surround sound you can turn on but in the end this not a home theater and we don't need that for the kids to watch. You can get it pretty loud and clear.We still have to get a blu-ray but even the pictures from the dvd look clear.Eventually we'll try hooking up a pc to this and see how that looks.  The only thing I wished for these tv's was to have built in wi-fi instead of having to buy an adapter. Cha-ching!Definitely buy this tv. Especially for the price you will NOT regret it.

Reviews.Title: Excellent!
Reviews.Author: J. P.
Reviews.Content: I want anyone reading to know I am a TV nut and early HDTV adopter. The slightest picture imperfection (excessive grain, inaccurate color, color bleeding, etc...) will drive me crazy and I am happy to report this Samsung has displayed none. This is my 3rd HDTV purchase and first in the 1080p 120+hz era.Got my hands on a this set last week for under $650. Hooked it up, calibrated with DVE and all I can say is WOW.Needed very little tweaking out of the box (Movie Mode). Picture is outstanding. Anyone in the market for a TV of this size should not hesitate.Colors are spot on. Blacks and whites are very good (after calibration). Gray scale is very accurate (after calibration). Screen uniformity is also very good.Still playing with 120hz motion control. I think I like soap opera effect (at least when watching cable).Blu-rays really look outstanding. You will not get a better TV in this price range.

Reviews.Title: Great tv with a few issues
Reviews.Author: Marie Garcia-Smith
Reviews.Content: I love the tv, it was exactly as described; however there is one major issue with the tv that people should know. This tv has the power button on the front bottom part of the tv, but it is not a button you push in; it is a button that is I think heat sensitive because you have to press power sign on the glass which is hard to see unless your looking straight at it. Think of the tv as a rectangle and on the bottom part of the rectangle smack dab in the middle is on button sensor. This is not in the manual which makes it even worse when trying to figure it out. I believe that was the only poor thing about it. I wish the picture and picture worked with TV to TV, not just component to TV and it doesn't work great with cable unless you play around ALOT with the picture stuff like sharpness and color, etc.Also, if you have an xbox, please realize that it can only go to 60hz so don't get the tv if your getting it mainly for gaming purposes.With the delivery, it took like 2 weeks when it said I would get it within 4 days. I didn't mind too much because the shipping was free, so can't really complain they sent a 40 inch for free. The shipping people were really nice when they scheduled the drop off and they were right on time. I would buy from them again.

Reviews.Title: Amazing Picture!!!!
Reviews.Author: Tucker
Reviews.Content: This is one amazing TV!  The picture is unbelieveable!  I went from a 32" to a 40" and couldn't be happier.  Easy set up!  The matt screen is a must for my sunroom.  Takes up very little room and even when not on it look great!  Very sleek. My daughter has the 46" and loves hers also.  The 40" fit my room size better.  Clear picture from any seat in the room.  I shopped around and couldn't match the price + free shipping not to mention the no interest payment plan.

Reviews.Title: Samsung HD TV
Reviews.Author: RLC2001
Reviews.Content: Great to this point.  Delivery and set-up were excellent.  Enjoyed saving $s by not paying tax.

Reviews.Title: Best ever
Reviews.Author: Hikerman95062
Reviews.Content: Bought this as a recomendation from 2 others that had " glare" issues. I have south facing windows behind me without shades and have no problem watching anytime of day. The 630 series is awesome.

Reviews.Title: Love this thing
Reviews.Author: Joshua Silverstein "Jsilvers"
Reviews.Content: What's not to like about it?  Crisp picture, you can make your own picture settings easily..  Just a great product all around.  I've had it for a few months now and don't regret this purchase one bit. *** Updated 12/20/11This thing is still awesome!

Reviews.Title: Samsung B630
Reviews.Author: Wynn Capps
Reviews.Content: Excellent picture quality, excellent product. Take some time learning how to operate the product from whomever you purchase it from. I should have done more research as to the HD channels and options I had from my cable provider.

Reviews.Title: Amazing
Reviews.Author: Vincent A. Rizzuto III
Reviews.Content: This TV is absolutely amazing. Much lighter than my previous 40 inch Samsung LCD HDTV. It's true 120HZ 1080p screen is absolutely amazing. It makes you feel in the movies. I have a BLU-RAY player and the HD of this tv is absolutely amazing! The price is definitely reasonable considering i payed double 2 years ago for the same TV with half the HZ. I'm overall satisfied with the TV in every way possible.

Reviews.Title: SAMSUNG AGAIN AND AGAIN
Reviews.Author: CHRISTOPHERLEWIS
Reviews.Content: AWESOME TV PICTURE QUALITY IS GREAT,PLUGGED MY EXTERNAL DRIVE WITH MY MOVIES AND MUSIC WORKED LIKE A CHARM PLAYED ALL FILE FORMATS I RECOMMEND THIS TV TO ALL GOT IT AT AMAZON 700+.A STEAL SEXY TV.

Reviews.Title: Perfect in every way
Reviews.Author: aqhapalomino
Reviews.Content: Easy set-up and menu; well-designed, great-looking TV; and most importantly, superb picture quality!  We've been loyal Sony buyers for years, but the Samsung 630 features at its price point were too impressive to pass up.  Glad we didn't -- we're very satisfied.  (Don't let the red Touch-of-Color scare you -- it's an extremely subtle accent -- barely noticeable).

Reviews.Title: Amazing clarity and options.
Reviews.Author: Richard J. Schlup
Reviews.Content: I think I really did my fair amount of research before I made this purchase. I compared the price,features, contrast ratio, Htz., and Plasma, LCD, DLP,. This 40" size is perfect for the bedroom. About 8-10 foot from where we view. We also purchased a blu-ray player to watch movies and the clairity is "Wow".Samsung has the best bang for the buck if you want a great Television. Purchased it on black Friday for 799.00 from Amazon.com. It came free shipping and was free of any damage. Totally recommend this TV.

Reviews.Title: Awesome!!
Reviews.Author: P. Maisonet
Reviews.Content: This is my 3rd HDTV and overall this is a GREAT TV and the best I have had so far!!! Picture is amazing!! I can't believe its currently selling for only $880!!! Well done Samsung!!!

Reviews.Title: awesome tv
Reviews.Author: Zachary White "islander"
Reviews.Content: Just what i wanted - did a lot of research and am very happy - shipped faster than expected and arrived in perfect condition

Reviews.Title: hardest part was the stand........but then.........
Reviews.Author: R. A. ELLIOTT "r.e."
Reviews.Content: ive had this tv for 2 weeks. I upgraded from a samsung 60 hz to this 120 hz.  Blew me away.The stand took a few minutes longer as a screw was abit tough,but after turning it on,it was outstanding right out of the box. 60hz to 120 is alot better. Sports looks great,but movies are almost too life like.As for the sound; in all honesty,ive had the samsung sound bar from my previous set,so i just use the external system. All in all, a great looking tv.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Quality & Value
Reviews.Author: M. Wynne
Reviews.Content: The Samsung 630 series is an astounding buy. I didn't purchase on Amazon, so I can't speak to the shipping, but the quality of this TV is of the highest caliber. Initial setup took less than 30 minutes to fully assemble the stand, secure the screen, and start watching Blu Ray movies. The unit seamlessly links with my Samsung BDP1600 Blu Ray player through Samsungs BD Wise and the two way communication between player and television is a nice feature that allows the two to synchronize settings, etc.The screen is crisp and the outer frame looks excellent. The TV has more than enough inputs to accommodate a large number of accessories. You can easily hook up multiple HDMI devices, which could be a serious concern on TVs with fewer inputs.The 120htz  Motion Plus feature is amazing for Sports, but new buyers should be aware of this feature when first using the TV to watch movies. The feature in essence increases the frame rate by extrapolating new frames by average the existing ones. The end result when watching sports is outstanding, but the default settings when I initially installed my Blu Ray player was quite jarring while viewing Blu Rays and DVDs. However, it was quite easy to adjust this setting once I realized what the problem was. Lowering the Blur Reduction and Judder reduction to around ¾ each produced an excellent quality for viewing movies.Overall this TV is a 10. The price and picture quality are both outstanding.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Picture Quality
Reviews.Author: Gurudev "savvy buyer"
Reviews.Content: I did a detailed and thorough research on LCD tv to zero in on Samsung for picture qualtiy,functionality and ease of operation.  It has fully met and at times exceeded our expectations.  It took us less than 1/2 an hour to take the tv out of the box and set it up in our family room.  It was very easy to connect the tv to cable and stereo receiver and DVD player.  The remote is very well designed with lighted key pad for ease of use in the dark.  It is loaded with spare HDMI and USB ports to easily connect your pc, camera or other devices to watch and enjoy pictures, video or surf internet on the big screen.Amazon delivery was better than I expected.  The delivery service called ahead of time to schedule a time window for the delivery.  By the way, Amazon had the best price and free delvery!  I can't think of any cons.  A great tv at a bargain price!

Reviews.Title: Samsung makes a great TV
Reviews.Author: K. Halloran "bridgenet"
Reviews.Content: I bought a Samsung 32" and a 52" through Amazon last year and now this 40" as Christmas presents.  Excellent TV, much better picture than Sony.  I also have a Bravia but not as good as the Samsung.  Suggest you do not pay more than $[...] as this TV is available from Costco and BJ's as well.  Price has recently increased on Amazon as I only paid $[...].

Reviews.Title: Football and Boxing Look Great on this TV!
Reviews.Author: Erik Manley
Reviews.Content: This TV has been great so far. I've been watching a lot of football and boxing on the HD channels and the picture couldn't be any clearer. The touch of color blends well with my furniture too for a very classy look. I would definitely reccomend this TV!

Reviews.Title: samsung lcd
Reviews.Author: G. Cobleigh
Reviews.Content: The delivery was on time and the delivery person unboxed the tv and made sure it turned on. It is a great product. The picture quality is first rate. It is easy to use and has easy to understand controls. The only issue may be to try to use the tv minus the remote. It is difficult to see the controls on the tv itself. I only use the remote so its great for me. I would reccomend this set without reservation.

Reviews.Title: samsung lcd tv
Reviews.Author: E. J. Raimondi
Reviews.Content: the picture on my samsung lcd is so clear, i have been debating if i really need a hi definition input. so far, i am just using my cable input. the other wonderful surprise was that the delivery man made sure my tv was in good working order before he left. some of amazon's competitiors wanted to charge another $150 to do this.

Reviews.Title: Great Television!
Reviews.Author: Jeffrey C. Lewis
Reviews.Content: We have another 56" Samsung DLP television and needed a smaller set for a back room.  Both sets are terrific. The new set, of course, gets the attention due to the higher 1080P resolution.  The setup of the 40" television was straightforward.  The television feed is from DirecTV and we also have a Samsung Blu-Ray player connected. If looking for a solid set with a terrific picture, you can't go wrong.

Reviews.Title: Great TV and great value
Reviews.Author: Ted D
Reviews.Content: The Samsung has the best picture on the market today. The Dolby sound is great. Some reviews were critical of the sound. This TV puts out great sound. I guess some critics are looking for ear drum damage.The TV looks great and is easy to set up if you take the time to read through the manual. The quality of style and workmanship shows. You will not be disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: John C. Pickeral
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a 120 hz flat screen with good performance and reliability ratings that was not so expensive.  After much research purchased this one, which came with a free Blue Ray DVD player.  So far I am happy with it in every way.  Great color, beautiful picture, nice features.

Reviews.Title: Excellent. I finally pull the plug and bought it
Reviews.Author: DKFC
Reviews.Content: I finally broke my piggy bank and bought this TV. My CRT has been an old faithful and I'd not need to splurge for a TV even though I've been working in the arena of set top boxes with HDTV since 2004. But the pricing, specs and reviews of this LN40B630 finally convince me that the time was right.A special note to Pilot Courier services. Kudos for a good job.I bought the TV on a Black Friday Saturday night and it was due to be delivered on 12/2/09. Tracking showed that it arrived in the metroplex the next day on 11/29 and was excited that I might get it earlier than was noted. However, morning of Dec. 2 came and still no TV. I called them after lunch and was told that they couldn't deliver it because they didn't have my contact phone no. to make an appointment for delivery. I got upset but long story short, they called me back and said they'll get it out to me between 5 - 9pm that very day. It finally came at 10.10pm, I was surprised that they went out of their way to make sure I got it that very day.I set it up right away and 30 minutes later we were watching TV!!

Reviews.Title: My first LCD TV
Reviews.Author: G. Creek
Reviews.Content: Everything has been working very well on it to date.  Set up tying into Dish satellite was no problem as well as receiving HD over the air stations.  Still learning some of the different features and capabilities.  I'm in agreement with the majority of the others who have given this TV good ratings.  Delivery was well coordinated with no issues.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Price for a TV!
Reviews.Author: YC
Reviews.Content: I happen to got this at the lowest price of $799. It was an excellent deal for a tv with 120hz. It makes such a big difference when I compared with my other tv with was running 60hz. I also tested it with a blue ray. The images were remarkable. It was clear and fast, no pixels in moving images on screen.Also, I received the tv in a 5 days. Pilot Air delivery was excellent, no damage to box or product.**After 7 months of usage, the tv had problem. The screen kept turning off randomly, but there was still sound coming from the tv. I called Samsung, their customer service was excellent. Becuase I still under their warranty, the repair was free. They scheduled an appointment for in home repair one week later. The first time they came and replaced the video board (that did not fix the problem), and the second time they replaced all the parts (like the motherboard and the powerboard). That finally fixed the problem. My tv hasn't turned off ever since. Excellent customer service and fast repair.

Reviews.Title: 120Hz Anti-Blur Motion Control makes a Difference
Reviews.Author: Sundown AL
Reviews.Content: Just purchased the LN40B630. So far the LCD is working great and has exceeded my expectations.  The picture actually looks better than when I saw this model in the showroom at BB.  It's probably due to the fact that I dimmed the lights in our living room.Absolutely great picture when viewing Bluray off my PS3. I also hooked it up to my 3 yr old OPPO upconverting DVD player. Although not as good as the bluray picture, it was much better than I had expected and a big leap over the way it looked on my old 720P LCD. I think the biggest improvement is the 120Hz anti-blur motion control.  I was considering a 1080P 60Hz without motion control.  I am 100% glad that I shelled out some extra money for the 120HZ with Motion Control.  From what I have read, 120HZ by itself does not make much of a difference, but 120HZ combined with the mfg's internal motion control software makes the 120HZ a worth while feature.  So this is something to think about when comparing one brand 120HZ LCD to another brand 120HZ LCD.  Not all 120HZ panels are equal.BTW, my old LCD was a samsung LN-R328W purchased as a christmas present back in Dec, 2005 (4 years ago). Althought there is some miinor burn-in on a small area on this old LCD, it is still working great after 4 years. But this LN40B630 is a giant leap ahead of that old samsung in terms of picture quality (contrast and anti-blur).In addition, my hats off to Amazon/Crutchfield for my order.  I ordered it on Friday AM (black Friday after Thanksgiving), it shipped out on Saturday AM, I recieved a phone call and e-mail from Crutchfield notifying me of the shippment.  The shipper called me on Monday, AM.  And the LCD was delivered to my door on Tuesday AM.  4 days from the date of order to my door, including the weekend.

Reviews.Title: The Best
Reviews.Author: Peter Kao
Reviews.Content: Love this LCD HD TV.  Easy to  operate.  Color and clarity is incredible.  It is right size for my study.  The TV is beautifu with its design.  I think Samsung has the best design among all LCD TVs.

Reviews.Title: Buy it You won't regret it
Reviews.Author: Joseph Obrien
Reviews.Content: This Samsung LCD is the finest Samsung I've seen and I have 4 of them.In fact with Christmas approaching will probably purchase anothedr as a gift for my daughter. The blacks are blacker and the TOC makes it stand apart in a room. Watched the World Series on the B630. Truly an outstanding High Def Set.

Reviews.Title: Good TV
Reviews.Author: Frank A. Krekeler
Reviews.Content: This TV is excellent and the delivery and installation was great!  My only complaint with the whole HDTV industry is that they don't tell you you must have a receiver with each set to get the very best picture.  I guess I'm supposed to know that, but when will the dish people perfect their connections so we don't need a separate receiver and monthly charge for each set?  Probably never.

Reviews.Title: Size matters...
Reviews.Author: E. Geva
Reviews.Content: We got this Samsung 40" LCD to replace our 10 year old TV. Wow. We love everything about it. It's very elegant and looks great in the living room. It's thin, so you get more space in a crammed NYC apartment. The picture is superb! Love it

Reviews.Title: I have had this tv for 3 weeks and ....
Reviews.Author: Richard L. Edwards
Reviews.Content: it has exceeded everything that I could have hoped for.  The picture is perfect and the sound from thetv is above average.  I picked up this tv from Best Buy for $899.  The 80,000:1 resolution is what sold me.  Compare to a Sony, and there is no comparison.  Oh and the 120HZ is two thumbs up.

Reviews.Title: samsung tv
Reviews.Author: Bradley G. Nelson "photonut"
Reviews.Content: have had this tv a few weeks now and can't say enough about it-had to use customer service twice to ask a question and they were quick to respond and they know their product

Reviews.Title: awesome cust svc/product
Reviews.Author: Dances with Beers "Dave"
Reviews.Content: Product was delivered on time and in great shape. Driver waited until I did a full inspection of screen and components. The quality of the product is second to none. TV remembers best setting for a particular type of program. I would highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: A picture as perfect as exists on an LCD TV
Reviews.Author: George Wilson
Reviews.Content: After missing the opportunity to purchase the "A" version of this HDTV, I jumped on the "B" version as soon as it came out.I have not a chance to watch a movie yet, but the TV picture is as fine as one could want.  And that is from a coax cable.  Because I did not have my HD cables I merely conencted it thru coax.  WOW!!!!  No glare, clear from any viewing angle in the room!!!The picture is great, and as soon as I hook up the HD cables, a further review will follow.

Reviews.Title: Great buy
Reviews.Author: H. NGUYEN
Reviews.Content: This is a great LCD HDTV. I'm definitely getting bang for my bucks. Great price and quality television. The financing option is a major plus as well. I highly recommend for anyone who's been thinking about a new TV and can't quite afford the newest LED's on the market. If you're thinking, and you're not doing that bad financially, jump on deals such as the one I got. You only live once!

Reviews.Title: Good TV at the price but..
Reviews.Author: Ashutosh Sharma "AP"
Reviews.Content: This is an excellent TV at the price. It has pretty much everything that I was looking for at this price point. Its been only a month since I got it and so far no issues.Only reason I gave 4 stars to it was due to the uselessness of the ethernet port provided. It is kind of misleading. You'll expect the TV to be DLNA compliant (or have DLNA capability, whatever..) but it does not have that. It simply gets you data for three not-so-useful widgets. There are so many capabilities once you add an ethernet port which are not being provided. It could be Samsung's way of differentiating between different models but then why provide an ethernet port in the first place.Other than that no issues whatsoever.

Reviews.Title: LN40B630 Review
Reviews.Author: Senthil V. Gopinathan "Senboy"
Reviews.Content: Great TV. Non glare. The one feature on this TV made me to buy was the playing DVD, Blu Ray movies right off from your USB drive. Sharp picture. Only  drawback would be the TV speakers. These speakers are not loud enough. But if you  connect them to an external speaker they sound better. Infolink feature is not really useful.

Reviews.Title: the search is over!
Reviews.Author: TIMSWHIMS
Reviews.Content: After searching local electronic stores and online for about a year and a half I finally took the leap and got this incredible TV.  I have only had it for about a week, but already am so happy with the purchase.  Reading horror stories about CEVA (delivery company) made me a little hesitant, but they were not a problem for me in the least. Simply track your package and call them to set up a delivery time if they don't call you first.  They bring it in, unwrap, and turn it on for you to make sure that there is a signal.  The rest is up to you.The  TV set has a lot of bells and whistles that I'm still playing with.  However,I was a little misguided when it came to the 120 hz feature.  I assumed that it would ALWAYS broadcast in 120hz for optimum clarity.  I was wrong.  The majority of the viewing is still in 60 hz and the 120 hz kicks in like a 'turbo' for high action sports scenes.  That being said, the HD channels that Comcast offers through my DVR cable box are the most spectacular I have ever seen on any TV that I have ever owned. I can't complain at all about the superb color.  Samsung is the way to go as far as features & style. I am also going to stream Pandora/Netflix with the Samsung Blu ray that I purchased to go along with the television. Take the plunge and get this great TV...LIFE IS TOO SHORT...ENJOY IT!!

Reviews.Title: is it a 120HZ looks like 60 HZ? Too much Blur!
Reviews.Author: MichaelDW "MSUKegRat"
Reviews.Content: When I turn is on it says 1980p @ 60 Hz.  wish I bought a 240 HZ. Way too much blur when any motion. Even when someone is walking across the screen it blurs. Everything else is good.

Reviews.Title: TV
Reviews.Author: Mr. Gopal K. Agarwal "gopal"
Reviews.Content: Delivered as promised except that the delivery was delayed for about 2 weeks since evening deliveries were not available.  I had to ask for a weekend delivery, and then first weekend was full.

Reviews.Title: pretty much perfect
Reviews.Author: Daniel Robert Diermayer "Danny"
Reviews.Content: I bought the 610 which has very few differences(none being picture related) and was really taken back by the mezmorizing picture.  It far surpases my previous 42" JVC and am very glad I made the change.pros:- brilliant brights colors- descrambler (free hd channels!)- variety of picture settings- 120hz smooth setting really enhances sportscons:- dark scenes look more like black/red/green flickers than truely black.  This may be more of an issue with video technology than the tv because pixar movies don't seem to have this same problemon a side note, I would definately recommend the 40" over the 46" if you don't have at least 10 feet b/w you and the tv because the images in my opinion are annoyingly pixelated.  After all, all they did was spread them out to make the picture bigger.

Reviews.Title: SUPER FAST WHITE GLOVE DELIVERY, AWESOME COMMUNICATION! GREAT PRICE!
Reviews.Author: Peter Yeung "A|X Chino"
Reviews.Content: I found this great deal on Amazon for my new Apartment, 40 in Samsung LCD w/ a free blu ray dvd player and a hdmi cable. It was perfect, my new entertainment system is complete!!! I did my research, it was the best deal I could find online. ONLY AMAZON!SUPER FAST WHITE GLOVE SHIPPING! TV IS AMAZING, PERFECT CONDITION BRAND NEW!

Reviews.Title: 5 Star DROPS to 3 star after support fails
Reviews.Author: SurpriseD
Reviews.Content: Samsung LN40B630 40-Inch 1080p 120Hz LCD HDTV with Red Touch of ColorThe Samsung LN40B630 DOES/DOES NOT exist!Try going into Samsung's download center for updates. There is a LN40B610 OR 640 but NO 630.I hooked up my Sony Blu-Ray player [aka PS3 aka Super Linux computer] & got the message:'Playback of BDs are prohibited on this system.To play you must first update the system software.'I just put in a support request. Will follow on when I know more.My previous review before arrival was a 5 star. Based on about 1 year research. Samsung is quality brand & they are far ahead or the pack in 120/240 hz motion blur.It arrived 4 days before estimated. Had it up & running in about 45 minutes. ******** 15 **** was finding the On/Off buttons - I had not pushed the power plug in solid. They really need to put a pull off decal where they are!!!!With an engineering background, I read the user guide. In the back was all the Linux credits so I knew it was based on a Linux OS computer.BAD NEWS Samsung uses their own patented flash memory so you are locked in buying ridiculously priced devices [$80 for usb wireless dongle]

Reviews.Title: Huge design error!!!
Reviews.Author: S. Kirker "steve"
Reviews.Content: Overall I'm happy with this TV, sound and picture are excellent. Only thing that really sucks is that you can't see the "on TV controls". Thats just a really dumb design error. When I unpacked the TV it took me 15 minutes just to find the "on " button. And that was after finding it on the instruction book!! I notice only one other person mentions that in his review. If you always use the remote its not an issue , however I bet a lot of owners don't even know there are actually control buttons on the tv panel. BAD JOB SAMSUNG on an otherwise great TV.

Reviews.Title: It WILL happen to YOU!
Reviews.Author: Christopher Arguello "Chris726"
Reviews.Content: This is an amazing TV since I saw it in stores. However, CEVA does the s&h; and their "handling" part of the deal is HORRIBLE! I waited one week just to have the TV shipped from AMAZON and CEVA took another week to deliver. I even called off work so that I did not have to wait another weekend to get my TV since the delivery was on Friday. I did not mind the wait since the shipping was free...but when it takes two weeks to get to my house and it comes with a big hole in the center of the screen, that really upsets me!The refund is going to take four weeks since I am not going to wait another month for a replacement. I told amazon that I would leave the order open IF the gave me express shipping but the denied my request. So here I am with no TV, and a cost under my credit card that is going to accumulate monthly interest for a product that I do not even own (because amazon takes so long to give a refund)I should have listened to the reviews of other customers that CEVA shipped damaged products. I know what you readers are thinking.."Oh but it won't happen to me!" Guess what? Yes it will. Save yourself the hassle and just buy it in stores.

Reviews.Title: not impressed for the price
Reviews.Author: B. Limbean "Dan"
Reviews.Content: the picture quality is not good, very grainy and dark , when I watch sport the refresh rate not good , the hd picture its nice but my new plasma way better  ,the 120hz refresh rate its weird , I don`t play games or for computer use , I went for a plasma TC-P42G10  way better , very impressed  , great picture , great for watching sports and movies on hd , My opinion , anything smaller then 40" go for lcd ,but above plasma rules the technology its way more advance , much better color,blacks , does not suffer from motion blur ,and so so .

Reviews.Title: Many Samsungs Fail After 1+ Years
Reviews.Author: wlkalong "wlkalong"
Reviews.Content: Do not buy a Samsung TV. My 40 inch Samsung LCD lasted just a little over 2 years. According to multiple internet sitesSamsung built a bunch of LCD TV's with bad capacitors that fail after a year or more (right after warranty is over).You can do a simple Google search and find many people who have had the same problems. After a year or two, the TV'sno longer turn on. Samsung has been made aware of this issue, but refuses to correct the problem. There are multiplesites that even tell you exactly how the problem is corrected. I am sure the number of people with this problem willincrease as time goes by. Even with the extended warranty, it is not worth the hassle of buying a large TV from acompany that does not support its products. I did a lot of research before choosing a Samsung, but since it wasearly in the production cycle, the problem did not appear. Don't take a chance, get another brand.

Reviews.Title: SAMSUNG - LEMON TV and POOR CUSTOMER SERVICE
Reviews.Author: Alaina Dion
Reviews.Content: I would give this TV and Samsung 0 stars if I could.  This TV didn't make it past the 5-month point.  It's 2 weeks and counting to have it repaired.  Samsung has lost any future business with me.

Reviews.Title: Delivery rating, not tv
Reviews.Author: sassy
Reviews.Content: I wish I could give a 5-star review for the tv. But I don't have it. I ordered this tv on Oct. 8, 2009 with estimated delivery Oct.15, 2009. It was coming by Pilot and tracking showed it to be in Indianapolis, IN on Oct.9 and in Groveport, OH on Oct 12. Having heard nothing from anyone on Oct. 15, I e-mailed Pilot and did get a quick response saying that my tv was now with their home delivery company and gave me a phone number. I called and was told that it would  not be delivered until Oct. 21 or 22, when they are in my area. Keep in mind that I am less than two hours away from Groveport and Grove City, Oh where this second company is located. There was nothing I could say that would get my tv delivered any sooner. So, it is sitting less than 2 hours from my home for 10 days waiting on some lazy delivery company to bring it to me. I just hope the tv is everything all the other reviewers say it is when I get it, if I ever do. By the way, when I ordered it the price was $1299-now it is $300+ less!

Reviews.Title: Cannot Trust Amazon.com
Reviews.Author: Photo Hobbyist
Reviews.Content: After seeing the last review about Amazon, I followed up only to find the same experience.  On the website it states that the TV can be delivered in 2 days - if you pick standard shipping.  In actuality it is 7 to 10 business days.  I am on the phone with them right now asking for a supervisor.

Reviews.Title: Tijuana (SAMEX) made
Reviews.Author: Matt_90254
Reviews.Content: This review is about Amazon rather than the Samsung TV. I believe that review here should include the experience with Amazon and the delivery too.First of all, Amazon failed on the delivery issue here big time. And it's NOT "CEVA" fault. It took Amazon a week to deliver the TV to "CEVA"! The customer service at Amazon was also rude. He claimed it's my fault that I have selected the free delivery! Well, why Amazon offers that service if it can't deliver in a reasonable time? Technically I got the TV in 13 days. First time I have problems with Amazon.The TV is made by (SAMEX) in Tijuana, Mexico. Does anyone believe that "in-home" assembly is the same as "third-party" assembly? I doubt it. Well it will take a while to see the defaults. Amazon didn't disclose that TV is made by a third party though. Anyone have experience with this issue before?The panel is most likely "A" panel (The serial number starts with AUYK). I couldn't figure out the type of panel this TV have for sure. Anyone knows how to find out about that?So far the TV looks good. I'm just worried about issues in near future for a SAMEX made.
